content: try this easy to follow chunky cowl crochet pattern that includes detailed step by step instructions with many photos this easy crochet cowl pattern will help you make your own crochet cowl scarf with confidence so don t hesitate and get started now and remember that i am happy to provide support with any of my crochet patterns if needed happy crocheting details - available only in english using us crochet terms - skill level beginner crochet skills and knowledge - finished size and gauge based on the use of 10 mm crochet hook = n/p15 and super bulky/ super chunky #6 yarn - width 33 cm / 14 - length 27 cm / 10 5 - gauge 4 x 4 4 clusters cluster = single_crochet and double_crochet in the same stitch x 7 row this crochet cowl pattern consists of - step by step pattern descriptions including lots of photos for guidance - information about materials and equipment needed - list of abbreviations used in the pattern materials needed i used - super bulky / super chunky #6 - 100% anti-pilling acrylic - 2x skeins of yarn - himalaya everyday big - color plum 70814 - 100g / 80m / 87yds - yardage 180 - 200g = cca 144 - 160m 157 - 174yds equipment needed - crochet hook size i used 10 mm hook = n/p15 but refer to the instructions on your yarn label if using different weight of yarn - scissors - yarn needle/tapestry needle - measuring tape - stitch marker - handmade label optional you may sell the crochet items you made using this easy cowl crochet pattern as long as you credit me as the original designer
